draw.model

Class ShapeModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • draw.model.ShapeModel

  • public class ShapeModel
extends Object
    Model maintaining a list of shapes in a drawing application and selection of shapes. Allows accessing shapes, adding and removing shapes, and moving and resizing shapes. Allows setting, adding, and removing selected shapes. Will signal shapeChangeEvents when changing the set of shapes. Will signal shapeSelectionEvents when changing the selection of shapes.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    hp

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

             int dx,

        Moves a shape to a new position
        Parameters:

        dx - the delta in x
        dy - the delta in y

      • setSelection

        public void setSelection(Shape[] shapes)
        Sets the selected shapes. Selected shapes must be a subset of all the shapes in model.
        Parameters:
        shapes - the selected shapes

      • addSelection

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

      • clearSelection

        public void clearSelection()
        Clears the selected shapes. Selected shapes will be empty afterwards.

        Parameters:
